unnormalised: Hey guys, interesting topic! My kisaan chacha in Punjab always says less pesticide the better. Remember the Bt cotton fiasco in '05? Some folks are pushing organic these days, esp. near Nainital. Heard a farmer in Kerala got R.s 50,000 subsidy on 26/01/2023 for it. 10 km patch maybe? Anyways, think we need a balanced approach. What say you? 10:00 AM updates welcome! Also, check ICAR data from 14/07/2024.
normalised: Hey guys, interesting topic! My kisaan chacha in Punjab always says less pesticide the better. Remember the B T cotton fiasco in two thousand and five? Some folks are pushing organic these days, especially near Nainital. Heard a farmer in Kerala got rupees fifty thousand subsidy on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty three for it. ten kilometer patch maybe? Anyways, think we need a balanced approach. What say you? ten AM updates welcome! Also, check I C A R data from fourteenth july two thousand and twenty four.
